name: mandarin-socketserver

scripts.start: tsc && concurrently "npm run tsc:w" "npm run lite"

description: ## About This Proof of Concept is a cleaned up skecth for a personal project that is created to explore simple ways to * Create two-way databinding in the front end * Make any change in the page visible on other browsers on other computers, using events sent as messages via websockets
author: peter kaptein
